**NOTE**

 - Teste ANCOVA para determinar se houve diferenças significativas
no Teste de Competencia em Leitura de Palavras e Pseudo-palavras (medido usando pre- e pos-testes).
 - ANCOVA test to determine whether there were significant differences
in CLPP Test (measured using pre- and post-tests).

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
# Install and Load Packages

if (!'remotes' %in% rownames(installed.packages())) install.packages('remotes')
if (!"rshinystatistics" %in% rownames(installed.packages())) {
  remotes::install_github("geiser/rshinystatistics")
} else if (packageVersion("rshinystatistics") < "0.0.0.9900") {
  remotes::install_github("geiser/rshinystatistics")
}

wants <- c('ggplot2','ggpubr','rshinystatistics','utils','randomcoloR')
has <- wants %in% rownames(installed.packages())
if (any(!has)) install.packages(wants[!has])

library(shiny)
library(esquisse)
library(scales)
library(knitr)
library(rmarkdown)

library(utils)
library(ggpubr)
library(ggplot2)
library(randomcoloR)

library(dplyr)

library(rshinystatistics)
```

```{r, include=FALSE, purl=FALSE}
options(knitr.kable.NA = '')
opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
```

```{r, include=FALSE}
# Setting Initial Variables
fatores2 <- c("genero","idade","zona.participante","escola","zona.escola")
lfatores2 <- as.list(fatores2)
names(lfatores2) <- fatores2

fatores1 <- c("grupo", fatores2)
lfatores1 <- as.list(fatores1)
names(lfatores1) <- fatores1

fatores3 <- c("monitor","monitor.genero","monitor.area","monitor.formacao","monitor.experiencia")
lfatores3 <- as.list(fatores3)
names(lfatores3) <- fatores3

lfatores <- c(lfatores1, lfatores3)

# ..

escolas <- readxl::read_excel("../data/data.xlsx", sheet = "escolas")
monitor <- readxl::read_excel("../data/data.xlsx", sheet = "monitores")
monitor <- monitor[,c("id",fatores3[-1])]

  
dat <- list()
dat.long <- list()
for (dv in c("score.CLPP","tri.CLPP","score.CR","tri.CR","score.CI","tri.CI","score.TV","tri.TV","score.TF","tri.TF","score.TO","tri.TO")) {
  df <- readxl::read_excel("../data/data.xlsx", sheet = "leitura.wg.wo.st.wide")
  df$idade <- sapply(df$idade, FUN = function(v) {
    if (!is.null(v) && !is.na(v)) return(paste0(v,"y")) else return(NA)
  })
  df <- merge(df, escolas, by.x = "escola", by.y = "id", all.x = T, all.y = F)
  df <- merge(df, monitor, by.x = "monitor", by.y = "id", all.x = T, all.y = F)
  df[["monitor"]] <- sapply(1:nrow(df), FUN = function(i) {
    if (df$monitor.count[i] == 1) df$monitor[i] else NA
  })
  df$grupo <- as.vector(sapply(df$grupo, FUN = function(x) {
    if (x == "Controle") "Controle" else "WordGen" 
  }))
  df$grupo <- factor(df$grupo, c("Controle","WordGen"))
  df$genero <- factor(df$genero, c("F","M"))
  df$zona.escola <- factor(df$zona.escola, c("Urbana","Rural"))
  df$zona.participante <- factor(df$zona.participante, c("Urbana","Rural"))
  
  dat[[dv]] <- df[!is.na(df[[paste0(dv,".pre")]]) & !is.na(df[[paste0(dv,".pos")]]),]
  
  df <- readxl::read_excel("../data/data.xlsx", sheet = "leitura.wg.wo.st.long")
  df$idade <- sapply(df$idade, FUN = function(v) {
    if (!is.null(v) && !is.na(v)) return(paste0(v,"y")) else return(NA)
  })
  df <- merge(df, escolas, by.x = "escola", by.y = "id", all.x = T, all.y = F)
  df <- merge(df, monitor, by.x = "monitor", by.y = "id", all.x = T, all.y = F)
  df[["monitor"]] <- sapply(1:nrow(df), FUN = function(i) {
    if (df$monitor.count[i] == 1) df$monitor[i] else NA
  })
  df$time <- factor(df$time, c("pre","pos"))
  df$grupo <- as.vector(sapply(df$grupo, FUN = function(x) {
    if (x == "Controle") "Controle" else "WordGen" 
  }))
  df$grupo <- factor(df$grupo, c("Controle","WordGen"))
  df$genero <- factor(df$genero, c("F","M"))
  df$zona.escola <- factor(df$zona.escola, c("Urbana","Rural"))
  df$zona.participante <- factor(df$zona.participante, c("Urbana","Rural"))
  
  dat.long[[dv]] <- df[!is.na(df[[dv]]),]
}

color <- list()
for (dv in c("score.CLPP","tri.CLPP","score.CR","tri.CR","score.CI","tri.CI","score.TV","tri.TV","score.TF","tri.TF","score.TO","tri.TO")) {
  color[[dv]] <- list()
  color[[dv]][["prepost"]] = c("#ffee65","#f28e2B")
  color[[dv]][["grupo"]] = c("#bcbd22","#008000")
  color[[dv]][["genero"]] = c("#FF007F","#4D4DFF")
  color[[dv]][["zona.escola"]] = c("#AA00FF","#00CCCC")
  color[[dv]][["zona.participante"]] = c("#AA00FF","#00CCCC")
}

for (f in c("grupo", names(lfatores))) {
  for (dv in c("score.CLPP","tri.CLPP","score.CR","tri.CR","score.CI","tri.CI","score.TV","tri.TV","score.TF","tri.TF","score.TO","tri.TO")) {
    if (is.null(color[[dv]][[f]])) 
      color[[dv]][[f]] <- distinctColorPalette(length(unique(dat[[dv]][[f]])))
  }
}
for (f in c(fatores2)) {
  for (dv in c("score.CLPP","tri.CLPP","score.CR","tri.CR","score.CI","tri.CI","score.TV","tri.TV","score.TF","tri.TF","score.TO","tri.TO")) {
    if (is.null(color[[paste0("grupo:",f)]])) 
      color[[paste0("grupo:",f)]] <- distinctColorPalette(length(unique(dat[[dv]][["grupo"]]))*length(unique(dat[[dv]][[f]])))
  }
}
```

# Descriptive Statistics of Initial Data

```{r, include=FALSE}
df <- do.call(plyr::rbind.fill, lapply(lfatores2, FUN = function(f) {
  df <- dat[["score.CLPP"]]
  get.descriptives(df, c("score.CLPP.pos","score.CLPP.pre"), c("grupo", f))
}))
(df <- df[,c(fatores1,"variable", colnames(df)[!colnames(df) %in% c(fatores1,"variable")])])
```

# Checking of Assumptions

## Assumption: Normality distribution



### Leitura de Pseudo-Palavras (Acertos)

```{r, echo=FALSE, include=FALSE}
(df <- do.call(plyr::rbind.fill, lapply(lfatores2, FUN = function(f) {
  df <- dat[["score.CLPP"]]
  normality.test.by.residual(df, "score.CLPP.pos", c("grupo", f), c(), "score.CLPP.pre")
})))
```

```{r, echo=FALSE, purl=FALSE}
kable(df)
```

# Pairwise comparisons for one factor 


## factor: **grupo**

### Leitura de Pseudo-Palavras (Acertos) 

```{r, include=FALSE}
pdat = dat[["score.CLPP"]]
pdat = pdat[!is.na(pdat[["grupo"]]),]
pdat = tryCatch(remove_group_data(pdat, "score.CLPP.pos", c("grupo")), error = function(e) NULL)

if (!is.null(pdat)) {
  pwc = ancova.pwc(pdat, "score.CLPP.pos", "grupo", "score.CLPP.pre", pwc.covar=T)
  (apa <- get.ancova.emmeans.with.ds(pwc, pdat, "score.CLPP.pos", c("grupo"), "apa-format", covar = "score.CLPP.pre"))
}
```

```{r, echo=FALSE, purl=FALSE}
if (!is.null(pdat))
  kable(apa, digits = 3)
```

```{r, include=FALSE}
if (!is.null(pdat)) {
  pdf <- get.ancova.pwc.table(pwc, only.sig = F)
  (pdf <- pdf[!is.na(pdf$p.adj),])
}
```

```{r, echo=FALSE, purl=FALSE}
if (!is.null(pdat)) {
  pdf <- round.pval(pdf)
  kable(pdf[,c(".y.","group1","group2","estimate","conf.low",
               "conf.high","se","statistic","p","p.adj","p.adj.signif")], digits = 3)
}
```

```{r, include=FALSE}
  pwc.long = anova.pwc(pdat.long, "score.CLPP", c("time","grupo"))
  pwc.long = pwc.long$score.CLPP$time
  (pdf.long <- pwc.long[!is.na(pwc.long$p.adj),])
}
```
